description:
Usa is hired to work at a student houseboy cafe after his Freakshow Ringmaster abilities are put on full display. He is handed a nametag that says Anekouji and introduced to his co-workers who can be described as being a few billion light-years removed from normal. While he`s on the job, he runs into his classmate Tagami who`s on a group date. One of the members is Ghost Whisperer Hayashi, who`s made a dramatic high school debut.
Source: crunchyroll
